title: 服务器中个别玩家被闪退，后台如下
author: loading..
txt_content:
[16:22:26] [Server thread/WARN]: Ignoring unknown attribute 'weapon.daze'
[16:22:26] [Server thread/WARN]: Ignoring unknown attribute 'weapon.attackSpeed'
[16:22:26] [Server thread/WARN]: Ignoring unknown attribute 'weapon.mountedBonus'
[16:22:26] [Server thread/WARN]: Ignoring unknown attribute 'weapon.penetrateArmor'
[16:22:26] [Server thread/WARN]: Ignoring unknown attribute 'weapon.daze'
[16:22:26] [Server thread/WARN]: Ignoring unknown attribute 'weapon.attackSpeed'
[16:22:26] [Server thread/WARN]: Ignoring unknown attribute 'weapon.mountedBonus'
[16:22:26] [Server thread/WARN]: Ignoring unknown attribute 'weapon.penetrateArmor'
[16:22:26] [Server thread/WARN]: Ignoring unknown attribute 'weapon.daze'
[16:22:26] [Server thread/WARN]: Ignoring unknown attribute 'weapon.attackSpeed'
[16:22:26] [Server thread/WARN]: Ignoring unknown attribute 'weapon.mountedBonus'
后台出现这样的提示，是更多武器模组的什么东西吧，然后有一个玩家就闪退了，后台出现服务器关闭了一个远程连接，
[TwilightForest] Biome ID conflict.  Biome ID 47 contains a biome named Freezer, but Twilight Forest is set to use that ID.
[17:06:09] [Server thread/WARN]: [TwilightForest] Biome ID conflict.  Biome ID 48 contains a biome named Freezer Jungle, but Twilight Forest is set to use that ID.
[17:06:09] [Server thread/WARN]: [TwilightForest] Biome ID conflict.  Biome ID 49 contains a biome named Eternal Mountain, but Twilight Forest is set to use that ID.
[17:06:09] [Server thread/WARN]: [TwilightForest] Biome ID conflict.  Biome ID 50 contains a biome named Frozen Plain, but Twilight Forest is set to use that ID.
[17:06:09] [Server thread/WARN]: [TwilightForest] Biome ID conflict.  Biome ID 51 contains a biome named Eternal Desert, but Twilight Forest is set to use that ID.
[17:06:09] [Server thread/WARN]: [TwilightForest] Biome ID conflict.  Biome ID 52 contains a biome named Tundra, but Twilight Forest is set to use that ID.
[17:06:09] [Server thread/WARN]: [TwilightForest] Biome ID conflict.  Biome ID 53 contains a biome named Glacier, but Twilight Forest is set to use that ID.
[17:06:09] [Server thread/WARN]: [TwilightForest] Biome ID conflict detected.  Edit the Twilight Forest config to give all biomes unique IDs.
[17:06:18] [Server thread/INFO]: xiao lost connection: Internal Exception: java.io.IOException: 远程主机强迫关闭了一个现有的连接。
还有一次也是一个玩家被弹出，后台出现了这个id冲突？暮色森林？ （服务器开了很久了，最近才出现这样的问题）
被闪退前那些玩家都没有做什么很奇怪的事，只是很普通的建建房子，种种菜什么的

replies.author: SakuraKooi
replies.txt_content:
[16:22:26] [Server thread/WARN]: Ignoring unknown attribute 'weapon.daze'
[16:22:26] [Server thread/WARN]: Ignoring unknown attribute 'weapon.attackSpeed'
[16:22:26] [Server thread/WARN]: Ignoring unknown attribute 'weapon.mountedBonus'

[16:22:26] [Server thread/WARN]: Ignoring unknown attribute 'weapon.attackSpeed'
[16:22:26] [Server thread/WARN]: Ignoring unknown attribute 'weapon.mountedBonus'复制代码
这是一大堆未知的weapon.xxxx的attribute标签
目测是某个有枪械的mod导致的
那掉线玩家估计背包内有物品带这些错误标签
[TwilightForest] Biome ID conflict.  Biome ID 47 contains a biome named Freezer, but Twilight Forest is set to use that ID.
[17:06:09] [Server thread/WARN]: [TwilightForest] Biome ID conflict.  Biome ID 48 contains a biome named Freezer Jungle, but Twilight Forest is set to use that ID.
[17:06:09] [Server thread/WARN]: [TwilightForest] Biome ID conflict.  Biome ID 49 contains a biome named Eternal Mountain, but Twilight Forest is set to use that ID.
[17:06:09] [Server thread/WARN]: [TwilightForest] Biome ID conflict.  Biome ID 50 contains a biome named Frozen Plain, but Twilight Forest is set to use that ID.
[17:06:09] [Server thread/WARN]: [TwilightForest] Biome ID conflict.  Biome ID 51 contains a biome named Eternal Desert, but Twilight Forest is set to use that ID.
[17:06:09] [Server thread/WARN]: [TwilightForest] Biome ID conflict.  Biome ID 52 contains a biome named Tundra, but Twilight Forest is set to use that ID.
[17:06:09] [Server thread/WARN]: [TwilightForest] Biome ID conflict.  Biome ID 53 contains a biome named Glacier, but Twilight Forest is set to use that ID.
[17:06:09] [Server thread/WARN]: [TwilightForest] Biome ID conflict detected.  Edit the Twilight Forest config to give all biomes unique IDs.复制代码
这是暮色的一大堆生物群系id冲突

总结:lz的mod配置乱七八糟 所以产生各种冲突,然后导致该问题,完毕

replies.author: 饭团团
replies.txt_content: MOD导致的，闪退算轻的。。有的会导致服务端都闪退了╮(╯▽╰)╭也就是崩了

replies.author: andylizi
replies.txt_content: 如果客户端崩溃，需要结合客户端崩溃报告进行判断。请提供崩溃报告(.minecraft/crash-reports/)
